statements: SELECT * FROM GrantNotifications;
SELECT grant_id, grant_name FROM GrantNotifications WHERE deadline_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT grant_id, grant_name, deadline_date FROM GrantNotifications WHERE is_notified = false ORDER BY deadline_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM GrantNotifications WHERE notification_date < NOW();
SELECT grant_id, grant_name, notification_date FROM GrantNotifications WHERE grant_name LIKE '%Research%' ORDER BY notification_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM GrantNotifications WHERE notification_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY deadline_date DESC
SELECT grant_name, deadline_date FROM GrantNotifications WHERE is_notified = TRUE ORDER BY notification_date ASC
SELECT grant_id, notification_date FROM GrantNotifications WHERE deadline_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY grant_id DESC
SELECT * FROM GrantNotifications WHERE grant_name LIKE '%research%' AND is_notified = FALSE
SELECT grant_id, grant_name, deadline_date, notification_date FROM GrantNotifications
SELECT * FROM grants;
SELECT grant_name, deadline_date FROM grants;
SELECT * FROM grants WHERE grant_id = 2;
SELECT recipient_name, email_address FROM grant_recipients;
SELECT grant_name, deadline_date, grant_id FROM grants ORDER BY deadline_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM grants;
SELECT grant_name, deadline_date FROM grants WHERE deadline_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT grant_id, grant_name, recipient_name FROM grants JOIN grant_recipients ON grants.grant_id = grant_recipients.grant_id;
SELECT grant_name, deadline_date FROM grants ORDER BY deadline_date DESC;
SELECT grant_name, email_address FROM grants JOIN grant_recipients ON grants.grant_id = grant_recipients.grant_id WHERE notification_sent = FALSE;
SELECT grant_name, grant_amount FROM grants;
SELECT * FROM grants WHERE grant_deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT org_name, org_phone FROM organizations ORDER BY org_name DESC;
SELECT notification_date, notification_sent FROM grant_notifications WHERE org_id = 1;
SELECT grant_name, grant_amount FROM grants WHERE grant_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM grants WHERE grant_amount > 10000 ORDER BY grant_deadline DESC;
SELECT grants.grant_name, organizations.org_name FROM grants JOIN organizations ON grants.grant_id = organizations.org_id WHERE organizations.org_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT grant_id, grant_amount FROM grants WHERE grant_deadline < '2022-01-01' AND grant_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT organizations.org_name, COUNT(*) AS notification_count FROM organizations JOIN grant_notifications ON organizations.org_id = grant_notifications.org_id GROUP BY organizations.org_name;
SELECT notification_id, grant_id, org_id, notification_date FROM grant_notifications WHERE notification_sent = FALSE ORDER BY notification_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM grants;
SELECT grant_name, deadline_date FROM grants WHERE deadline_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY deadline_date DESC;

SELECT grants.grant_name, applicants.applicant_name, notifications.notification_message FROM grants INNER JOIN applications ON grants.grant_id = applications.grant_id INNER JOIN applicants ON applications.applicant_id = applicants.applicant_id INNER JOIN notifications ON applicants.applicant_id = notifications.applicant_id WHERE notifications.read_status = FALSE;
SELECT applicants.applicant_name, applications.status FROM applicants LEFT JOIN applications ON applicants.applicant_id = applications.applicant_id ORDER BY applicants.applicant_name ASC;
SELECT grant_name, COUNT(application_id) AS total_applications FROM grants LEFT JOIN applications ON grants.grant_id = applications.grant_id GROUP BY grant_name ORDER BY total_applications DESC;
SELECT * FROM grants;
SELECT applicants.applicant_name, applications.application_id FROM applicants JOIN applications ON applicants.applicant_id = applications.applicant_id;
SELECT grant_name, deadline_date FROM grants WHERE deadline_date >= CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT applicant_name, notification_message FROM applicants INNER JOIN notifications ON applicants.applicant_id = notifications.applicant_id WHERE notifications.read_status = FALSE;
SELECT grant_name, status FROM grants LEFT JOIN applications ON grants.grant_id = applications.grant_id;
SELECT * FROM grants;
SELECT grant_name, grant_amount FROM grants WHERE organization_id = 1;
SELECT grant_name, application_deadline FROM grants ORDER BY application_deadline DESC;
SELECT organization_id, COUNT(grant_id) AS grant_count FROM grants GROUP BY organization_id;

SELECT users.first_name, users.last_name, grants_applicants.application_status FROM users JOIN grants_applicants ON users.user_id = grants_applicants.user_id WHERE grants_applicants.application_status = 'Approved';
SELECT grant_name, grant_amount FROM grants ORDER BY grant_amount DESC, grant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM grants WHERE application_deadline > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';

SELECT organization_id, organization_name, COUNT(*) AS grant_count FROM organizations JOIN grants ON organizations.organization_id = grants.organization_id GROUP BY organization_id, organization_name;

SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, g.grant_name, ga.application_status FROM users u JOIN grants_applicants ga ON u.user_id = ga.user_id JOIN grants g ON ga.grant_id = g.grant_id WHERE u.email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT notification_id, notification_message, notification_date FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_date DESC;
